review: This is simply just magic! which is what my mom said.  this little thumdrive sized gizmo plugs into your HDMI slot on your TV and then a micoUSB for power, download the app on your phone and youre ready to go.  music?  put it on the big screen. cat videos on youtube? put it on the big screen. that netflix show? put it on the big screen.  buy a movie from Google Play? put it on the big screen.  you can eve download the chrome extension and mirror your browser, however that one does have a little lag.  but all in all, and especially since i cut the cable 5 years ago, this has changed the way i watch TV.
